string.name: lbl_no_data
string.description: Label used when there are no data matches found

string.name: lbl_only_on_stock
string.description: Label. Label used when the user checks if only on stock items should be displayed

string.name: lbl_loading_data
string.description: Label. Label used when the application loads data

string.name: lbl_buy_now
string.description: Label. Label used on the button the user uses to buy an item

string.name: lbl_only_one_in_stock
string.description: Label. Label used on the button the user uses to buy, when only one item is left in stock

string.name: lbl_order_completed
string.description: Label. Label used when the user completes a buy operation

string.name: lbl_no_items_left
string.description: Label. Label used when there is no item left
